title: Roasted veggies with couscous
ingredients: ['1 large courgette, thickly sliced', '100g (4 oz) mushrooms, quartered', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '750ml (1 1/4 pints) water', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '350g (12 oz) couscous', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar']
